properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm; Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary; Coastal Waters extending out to 25 nm South of Marthas Vineyard and Nantucket
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 8:03PM EST until February 5 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
3 to 5 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary, Coastal waters from
Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm and
Coastal Waters extending out to 25 nm South of Marthas
Vineyard and Nantucket.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 3 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 3 PM EST WEDNESDAY
